headers.subject: [tosdr:1713] [Bad] Spotify can remove content at any time for any or no reason

html:
They can close your account without notice, without refund and without reason.

Spotify does not monitor, review, or edit User Content, but reserves the right to remove or disable access to any User Content for any or no reason, including but not limited to, User Content that, in Spotify’s sole discretion, violates these Agreements. Spotify may take these actions without prior notification to you. Removal or disabling of access to User Content shall be at our sole discretion, and we do not promise to remove or disable access to any specific User Content.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [Bad] Spotify can remove content at any time for any or no reason
text:
They can close your account without notice, without refund and without 
reason.

Spotify does not monitor, review, or edit User Content, but reserves the 
> right to remove or disable access to any User Content for any or no reason, 
> including but not limited to, User Content that, in Spotify’s sole 
> discretion, violates these Agreements. Spotify may take these actions 
> without prior notification to you. Removal or disabling of access to User 
> Content shall be at our sole discretion, and we do not promise to remove or 
> disable access to any specific User Content.


https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/ 

--
